EmailTemplate.name: Follow up on Inquiry with MBO Partners (1341509799.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow up on Inquiry with MBO Partners (1341509799.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Dear James, As a courtesy, I wanted to follow up on the voicemail I left you. My name is Nicolette Taylor and I’ll be responsible for answering any questions you may have and providing you an overview of our services. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you to chat using my online schedule <https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK>. You may also watch a short video about who we are on YouTube <http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zKDzwSTmGv4&hd=1>. You may also look at some of the stories from indepdenents <http://info.mbopartners.com/meet-the-independents.html> who use MBO Partners. I look forward to speaking with you, Nicolette
